Articles.Content: So there used to be a way to purchase kerbal figurines? I can't seem to find it. I'd love to buy some.
Shapeways used to sell official KSP models, but the KSP store has been offline for a little while now. This thread has more discussion along with the last real update ("we're working on it")

Moving to Kerbal Network, since this is about paraphernalia associated with KSP, rather than the KSP game itself.

(I have the vague impression that the Take Two acquisition may have had an impact on KSP merchandising, as in "shut down most pre-acquisition merchandising", but that's based on fuzzy memory of stuff briefly skimmed months ago and I could be wrong about that.)
I wish I could get one of the little Kerbal Stargazer figurines to go with my Eucl3d Diamondback figurine... which I believe is also out of business now.
